languages.text: "Вы уже указали на это префекту, а я получил отметку в личном деле. Если этого недостаточно, и вы ждете от меня каких-то комментариев — я отвечу".
"You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."
languages.original_text: "Вы уже указали на это префекту, а я получил отметку в личном деле. Если этого недостаточно, и вы ждете от меня каких-то комментариев — я отвечу".

traits.locale_text: "You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."
"You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."
"You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."
"You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."
"You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."
"You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."

languages.text: 「そのことはあなたが総監に述べて、私の記録にも残されています。それでも不十分で、私にも発言を求めるというのであれば…お話しします」
languages.original_text: "You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."

traits.locale_text: 「そのことはあなたが総監に述べて、私の記録にも残されています。それでも不十分で、私にも発言を求めるというのであれば…お話しします」

languages.text: "Das habt Ihr schon zur Präfektin gesagt, und ich habe es in meinen Bericht aufgenommen. Falls Euch das nicht reicht und ich einen Kommentar abgeben soll, werde ich das tun."
languages.original_text: "You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."

traits.locale_text: "Das habt Ihr schon zur Präfektin gesagt, und ich habe es in meinen Bericht aufgenommen. Falls Euch das nicht reicht und ich einen Kommentar abgeben soll, werde ich das tun."

languages.text: « C'est ce que vous avez indiqué à la préfète et j'en ai bien pris note. Si cela ne vous satisfait pas et que vous attendez un commentaire de ma part, permettez-moi de m'exprimer. »
languages.original_text: "You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ce que vous avez indiqué à la préfète et j'en ai bien pris note. Si cela ne vous satisfait pas et que vous attendez un commentaire de ma part, permettez-moi de m'exprimer. »

languages.text: «Eso le dijo a la prefecta, y así consta en mi informe. Si con eso no le basta y espera que me explaye, lo haré».
languages.original_text: "You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."

traits.locale_text: «Eso le dijo a la prefecta, y así consta en mi informe. Si con eso no le basta y espera que me explaye, lo haré».

languages.text: “那些话是你自己说给行政官听的，我也记在了我的记录里。如果你希望我能发表一下评论的话，我愿意。”
languages.original_text: "You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."

traits.locale_text: “那些话是你自己说给行政官听的，我也记在了我的记录里。如果你希望我能发表一下评论的话，我愿意。”

languages.text: "Prefekte bunu aktardınız, ben de raporuma işledim. Bu yetersiz geldiyse ve bir yorumda bulunmamı bekliyorsanız derhâl bulunayım."
languages.original_text: "You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."

traits.locale_text: "Prefekt'e bunu aktardınız ve ben de raporuma işledim. Bu yetersiz geldiyse ve bir yorumda bulunmamı bekliyorsanız derhâl bulunayım."

languages.original_text: "You stated as much to the prefect, and it went down in my record. If that is insufficient and you expect me to comment, then I will."
